name: sapphic

Sapphic adjective
(POETRY)
Add to word list

literature
  specialized relating to a type of poetry with four lines that is similar to the poetry of Sappho, a poet in ancient Greece

Sapphic adjective
(SEXUALITY)
literary relating to lesbians (= women who are sexually attracted to other women): Sapphic love/passion
